column2: The mystical tower, located on a nexus of ley lines.
A fount of mystical power. Its waters are holy to the high elves.
A giant complex where harvested souls are collected and stored to power the Legion's war machines.
A giant complex where harvested souls are collected and stored to power the Legion's war machines. Its black walls hide many secrets of dark magic, intrigue and warfare.
A masterpiece of Nerubian architecture. The numerous rooms of this building serve as a home for both the living and the dead.
A masterpiece of Nerubian architecture. Its endless corridors hide many secrets of dark magic, intrigue and warfare.
A dark symbol of the Old Gods' burgeoning power on Azeroth. Various branches of the cultists dwell deep beneath the towering form.
A dark symbol of the Old Gods' burgeoning power on Azeroth. Its elementium walls hide many secrets of dark magic, intrigue and warfare.
